description:
cmd/5l: fix encoding of new MOVB, MOVH instructions

They are just like MOVW and should be setting only
two register fields, not three.

messages.text:

They are just like MOVW and should be setting only
two register fields, not three.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev, remyoudompheng
